### What to do for Week 7 after class ends

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square-check", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  
Submit = c(checked,
           checked,
           checked,
           unchecked),

Description = c("Complete the <i>Introduction to Statistics in R</i> module on Data Camp",
                "Begin the <i>Introduction to Data in R<i> module on Data Camp",
                "Complete problems 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 in Chapter 6",
                "Take a look at the `tidyverse` cookbook"),

Location = c( "[Link](/datacamp/03-module/)",
              "[Link](/datacamp/04-module/)",
              "[Link](/tasks/06-tasks/#homework)",
              "[Link](https://rstudio-education.github.io/tidyverse-cookbook/){target='_blank'}"
               )
) %>%
 mutate(Link = paste0("<a href=", str_extract_all(Location, "(?<=\\().+?(?=\\))"), "> <i class='fa-solid fa-link' style='color:#598fff'></i> </a>")) %>%
  select(-Location)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE)  %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(wk_post), extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', background = "#212121", color = "#ffffff")
```

### What to do for Week 8 before coming to class

